ack.p: Thank you to others who have contributed to this work including Scott Schuetter and Scott Hackel for work to develop the RBESS. We wish to thank the publicly funded organizations that have provided data and models used in this study, in particular, the US EPA for developing the CMAQ model, BenMAP, and associated data, and NARCCAP for providing the data used in this paper. NARCCAP is funded by the National Science Foundation, the US Department of Energy, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, and the US EPA Office of Research and Development.
